title: Dragon Trainer Lulu VFX Bug

embed.description: League of Legends Dragon Trainer Lulu Skin. Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Lulu on her Dragon Trainer Skin. All footage was taken in game.

body:
[GAMEPLAY] Lulu - Dragon Trainer Lulu's passive VFX bugged.

On Dragon Trainer Lulu, when attacking an enemy, Pix's bolts are the same as the Classic skin's VFX. Upon release, this skin had its own VFX for the passive and can be referenced with the video I've provided. (0:38)

1. Enter a game with the Dragon Trainer Lulu skin selected.
2. Attack any enemy unit that activates the passive. (This includes enemy minions and Champions.)

This occurs in every single game and has been witnessed when other people use this skin as well. Items do not affect this bug.

replies.body:
Hey Kevee,

Thanks for the report! I'm not sure what happened here, but I'll poke around in her files. :)

Nothing new at the moment - 

We'd look to see if the hookup had just come undone, but it appears that it's a bit deeper of an issue. It's on our bug list, but wasn't a 'quick fix', as we'd originally intended.

**EDIT**: The file that we thought was gone forever due to some shuffling in file structure was found, which means we didn't need to fully create a new particle (which is why it wasn't going to be a quick fix).

So, we hooked that back up, and all will be well in 7.17. :) 

http://imgur.com/PMQEXGS

Thank you very much, ^^ 
also for giving master chef kench his fork back :P
